api_list.name: Send Emails
api_list.description:
This Endpoint is a POST request end point and takes the following :
{
	"hostname" : "mail.example.com",
    "sender" : "someone@example.com",
    "port" : 465,
    "password" : "KJKJKJ@kjj2nxk",
    "to" : "friend@example.com",
    "subject" :"any",
    "message" : "any" 
"_"
}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://promails.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "promails.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://promails.p.rapidapi.com/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "promails.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
